epd_metadata.address: 8700 West Bryn Mawr Avenue, Suite 300, Chicago, IL 60631

product_description.intended_use: Landscaping, domestic gardening, reclamation, and other construction applications

end_of_life.disposal_recommendations: Dispose of contents/container in accordance with local, regional, national, territorial, provincial, and international regulations.

hazards_identification.other_hazards: Contains crystalline silica; exposure may cause lung damage, silicosis, lung cancer, or respiratory irritation.

first_aid_measures.general: Never give anything by mouth to an unconscious person. If you feel unwell, seek medical advice.
first_aid_measures.inhalation: Go into open air and ventilate suspected area. Obtain medical attention if breathing difficulty persists.
first_aid_measures.skin_contact: Remove contaminated clothing. Wash with soap and water. Obtain medical attention if irritation develops.
first_aid_measures.eye_contact: Rinse cautiously with water for at least 5 minutes. Remove contact lenses if present. Obtain medical attention if irritation develops.
first_aid_measures.ingestion: Rinse mouth. Do NOT induce vomiting. Seek medical advice if unwell.

fire_fighting_measures.suitable_extinguishing_media: Use extinguishing media suitable for surrounding type of fire.
fire_fighting_measures.special_hazards: Not flammable. Product is not explosive.
fire_fighting_measures.firefighting_instructions: Use water spray or fog for cooling exposed containers.

accidental_release_measures.personal_precautions: Avoid creating dusty conditions. Avoid prolonged contact with eyes, skin, and clothing. Avoid breathing dust.
accidental_release_measures.methods_for_cleaning_up: Clean up spills immediately and dispose of waste safely. Recover the product by vacuuming, shoveling, or sweeping.

handling_and_storage.precautions_for_safe_handling: Wash hands and other exposed areas with mild soap and water before eating, drinking, or smoking. Avoid prolonged contact with eyes, skin, and clothing. Avoid breathing dust.
handling_and_storage.storage_conditions: Keep container closed when not in use. Store in a dry, cool place.

exposure_controls.personal_protective_equipment: Safety glasses, gloves, dust mask if necessary.

stability_and_reactivity.reactivity: Hazardous reactions will not occur under normal conditions.
stability_and_reactivity.chemical_stability: Stable under recommended handling and storage conditions.

regulatory_information.US_federal_regulations: Listed on the United States TSCA inventory
regulatory_information.California_Proposition_65: WARNING: This product can expose you to Quartz, which is known to the State of California to cause cancer.
